author: Staff Reporter
text:
The total hundial collection of Sri Dhandayuthapaniswamy temple for the past 20 days was cash Rs.2,11,88,257, according HR&CE Joint Commissioner P. Rajamanickam here on Wednesday.

Besides, 590 grams of gold, 6,550 grams of silver and 592 number of foreign currency notes in various denominations were the other collections in the hundial. More than 300 volunteers, including students, temple staff and bank employees, participated in the counting process.
title: Hundial collection
